issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare, protecting pre-existing conditions, and strengthening the Affordable Care Act

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate change mitigation, supporting Green New Deal principles and renewable energy investments

issues.title: Economic Recovery
issues.description: Supports middle-class tax relief, infrastructure investment, and small business support in response to economic challenges

issues.title: Criminal Justice Reform
issues.description: Advocates for police accountability, ending mass incarceration, and addressing systemic racial inequities in the justice system

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, protecting DACA recipients, and creating a path to citizenship

issues.title: Education Investment
issues.description: Supports increased funding for public education, student debt relief, and expanding access to higher education

issues.title: Voting Rights Protection
issues.description: Advocates for protecting voting rights, opposing voter suppression, and expanding ballot access
